name: Porta-Drill, Inc., Appellant, v. R. M. Hall Corporation

parties: Porta-Drill, Inc., Appellant, v. R. M. Hall Corporation.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,
